title: Acoustic modeling with deep neural networks using raw time signal for LVCSR
excerpt: Abstract In this paper we investigate how much feature extraction is required by a deep neural network (DNN) based acoustic model for automatic speech recognition (ASR). We decompose the feature extraction pipeline of a state-of-the-art ASR system step by step  ...
